TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrustSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class TrustSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定程式碼存取安全性層級，其會套用至應用程式。

span.span: Configures the code-access security level that is applied to an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改組態檔``一節。The class lets you programmatically access and modify the configuration file `` section. ``區段會設定用來執行特定的應用程式的程式碼存取安全性權限集。The `` section configures the code-access-security permissions set that is used to run a particular application. 在機器、 網站和應用程式層級，就可以宣告這一節。This section can be declared at the machine, site, and application levels. ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何以宣告方式指定值的數個屬性類別。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二個示範如何使用型別。The second demonstrates how to use the type. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式指定值的數個屬性類別。The following configuration file example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/CS/trustsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/VB/trustsection.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得的執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. 下表顯示用於預設設定建構函式。The following table shows the default settings that are used for the constructor. |設定Setting|預設值Default value| |-------------|-------------------| ||`Full`| ||`""`|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HostSecurityPolicyResolverType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HostSecurityPolicyResolverType : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂安全性原則解析類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom security-policy resolution type.

value.span: 自訂安全性原則解析類型。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果為空字串，應用程式使用 ASP.NET 預設原則來決定組件的權限。If is an empty string, the application uses ASP.NET default policy to determine an assembly's permissions. 預設原則評估的權限授與完全信任的全域組件快取 (GAC) 組件和其他組件的部分信任。The default policy for evaluating permissions grants full trust to the Global Assembly Cache (GAC) assemblies and partial trust to the other assemblies. 此屬性無法設為`null`值。This attribute cannot be set to a `null` value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool LegacyCasModel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.LegacyCasModel : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指示舊版程式碼存取安全性是否已啟用。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates whether the legacy code access security is enabled.

value.span: 如果舊版程式碼存取安全性已啟用則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if legacy code access security is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用舊版的程式碼存取安全性時，適用於下列的安全性規則：When legacy code access security is enabled, the following security rules apply: - 程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 原則會建立從電腦原則和指定的 ASP.NET 部分信任原則檔案的組合。Code access security (CAS) policy is established from the combination of machine policy and the specified ASP.NET partial trust policy file. - 部分信任應用程式定義域還原為在完全信任應用程式定義域層級。Partial trust application domains revert to being full trust at the application domain level. - 位於設定目錄中的舊版的部分信任檔案[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]安裝目錄而不是新的部分信任組態檔位於相同的目錄中使用。The legacy partial trust files located in the CONFIG directory in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] install directory are used instead of the new partial trust configuration files that are located in the same directory. 舊版的檔案包含中找不到的成員資格條件[!INCLUDE[net_v11_long](~/includes/net-v11-long-md.md)]或是[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]新版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The legacy files include the membership conditions that were found in the [!INCLUDE[net_v11_long](~/includes/net-v11-long-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. - 若要評估的權限的其他成員資格條件會套用，ASP.NET 部分信任的檔案中所定義。Additional membership conditions to evaluate permissions are applied, as defined in ASP.NET partial trust files. CONFIG 目錄隨附[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]版本包含舊版的部分信任原則檔案。The CONFIG directory that ships with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] release contains legacy partial-trust policy files. 這些檔案的名稱包含字串 「 舊版 」，並且包含[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]區段。The names of these files include the string "legacy" and contain the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] sections. 下列各節包含評估 CAS 原則對組件所需的非空白成員資格條件。These sections contain non-empty membership conditions that are needed to evaluating CAS policy against assemblies. - 如果其中一個預設部分信任的組態檔，ASP.NET 應用程式正在執行部分信任和信任層級對應的安全性原則檔中，ASP.NET 會自動選擇對應舊版的設定檔。If the ASP.NET application is running in partial trust and the security policy file for the trust level maps to one of the default partial trust configuration files, ASP.NET automatically chooses the corresponding legacy configuration file. 比方說，如果安全性原則通常會載入從 Web_mediumtrust.config，然後在舊版模式中 ASP.NET 會改為安全性原則從載入 Legacy.web_mediumtrust.config。For example, if the security policy would ordinarily be loaded from Web_mediumtrust.config, then in legacy mode ASP.NET will instead load security policy from Legacy.web_mediumtrust.config.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Level { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Level : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在其下執行應用程式的安全性層級名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the security level under which the application will run.
The name of the trust level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定在其下的應用程式將會執行的安全性層級。The property specifies the security level under which the application will be run. 預設值為 `"Full"`。The default is `"Full"`. 有五個可用的信任層級：There are five available trust levels: - 完整Full - HighHigh - 中Medium - 低Low - 最小Minimal 具名的層級對應中所定義的安全性層級``項目``。The named levels correspond to the security levels that are defined in the `` element for ``. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/CS/trustsection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/VB/trustsection.vb#2)]

related.span: ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files

span.span: ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OriginUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OriginUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 指定應用程式來源的 URL。

span.span: Specifies the URL of origin for an application.

value.span: 語式正確 (Well-Formed) 的 HTTP URL 或是空字串 ("")。

span.span: A well-formed HTTP URL or an empty string ("").
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定應用程式的原始 URL。The property specifies the URL of origin for an application. 如果有的話，這可以用於某些權限，例如相關聯類別。If present, this can be used for some permissions, such as those associated with the class. 這可讓您用來建立權限，透過將單一 URL 指定執行個體。This enables you to specify a single URL that is used to create permission through a instance. 然後此權限授與具有部分信任的 ASP.NET 程式碼進行至該 URL 的 HTTP 呼叫 （例如，Web 服務呼叫） 的權限。This permission then grants ASP.NET code that has partial trust the right to make HTTP calls (for example, a Web service call) to that URL. 值必須是語式正確的 HTTP URL。The value must be a well-formed HTTP URL. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/CS/trustsection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/VB/trustsection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PermissionSetName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PermissionSetName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定使用權限集的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the permission set.
The name of the permission set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您在部分信任的組態檔中定義的應用程式定義域初始化期間使用的具名的使用權限。The property enables you to define in a partial trust configuration file the named permission set that is used during the initialization of an application domain. 根據預設，屬性是"ASP.Net"這是用來初始化應用程式定義域的權限集合的名稱。By default, the property is "ASP.Net" This is the name of the permission set that is used to initialize the application domain. 此屬性無法設為空字串或`null`值。This attribute cannot be set to an empty string or a `null` value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ProcessRequestInApplicationTrust { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ProcessRequestInApplicationTrust : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指示網頁要求是否自動受限於 ASP.NET 應用程式已套用之信任原則檔案內所設定的使用權限。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates whether page requests are automatically restricted to the permissions that are configured in the trust policy file that is applied to the ASP.NET application.

value.span: 如果要求會自動受限於信任原則檔案中設定的使用權限則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if requests are automatically restricted to the permissions that are configured in the trust policy file; otherwise, .
